text: as more students and teachers moved
their class loads online it became
critical for us to find a way not only
to scale to meet that increased load but
to keep our costs down and we've needed
to adjust to our users new usage
patterns and so those graviton 3 based
instances were able to help us Meet The
increased load keep costs down not only
for our web applications but also for
our database servers and cache instances
so we use graviton 3 instances in a
number of places in our stack they've
provided us
as much as 20 percent Improvement in
throughput and in cost savings versus
older instances types that we were using
we use graviton 3 instances in our
database layer where we self-host
postgres on ec2 and we've seen similar
costs in performance benefits there as
well our engineering teams found that
there's great support in open source
technology and so we were able to just
quickly recompile what we use and deploy
it and and see those benefits and cost
savings with very little work from the
engineering teams the big benefit for
our Learners and teachers has been that
they don't have to worry about the
reliability of our system and that they
can focus on teaching and learning and
excelling in the things that are
important to them
